ValidationRule.description: Validates that a Demo Due Date for a Custom demo type is more than 7 days out from the current date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL( Demo_Type__c , "Custom"), Demo_Due_Date__c < TODAY()+7 ),
AND( ISCHANGED(Demo_Due_Date__c), ISPICKVAL( Demo_Type__c , "Custom"), Demo_Due_Date__c < TODAY()+7) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Whoa there! Demo Due Date for Custom demos must be 7 days out from the current date. Please update accordingly.
